content:
Hi everyone,
I want to create a lean project that depends on both mathlib and another lean project, for example https://github.com/mariainesdff/LocalClassFieldTheory/
What do I need to do? Where should I download this lean project and how should I modify the lakefile? Thank you very much!

I think you should create a lakefile.lean with require local_class_field_theory from git https://github.com/mariainesdff/LocalClassFieldTheory.git and copy https://github.com/mariainesdff/LocalClassFieldTheory/blob/master/lean-toolchain
Jiang Jiedong has marked this topic as resolved.
